column3: International Business School Suzhou at XJTLU
column5: The MSc Finance programme gives you the tools to solve the practical financial problems that will create value for companies and enable societies to evolve.You will gain theoretical knowledge in corporate finance, financial markets and asset pricing as well as quantitative skills that will allow you to conduct research and analyse real-world problems. The study of financial economics and banking will allow you to excel in both the finance and economics sectors.The programme combines traditional academic modules with research seminars, discussions with academics and visiting researchers and industry networking opportunities, to provide you with an integrated learning environment with strong connections to the real world.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
